title: Has an "extremist Muslim" received bail from a liberal Democrat judge after training children to shoot at schools?
subtitle: Despite the anger on the Internet saying otherwise, New Mexico "compunce" defendant Siraj Ben and Hagg was not released on bail, as he was detained under an order from outside the state.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A judge of the Liberal Democracy of a Muslim extremist association who trained children at the New Mexico compound to become school shooters was released.
